name: Daria, Dimensional Witch
cardText:
[evolve][cost01]: Evolve this follower.
[fanfare] Discard your hand. Put the top card of your deck into your EX area. Repeat this until your EX area is full.
While this card is on your field, include both spells and [runecraft] followers in your cemetery when counting your Spellchain.

effectText.body: Discard your hand. Put the top card of your deck into your EX area. Repeat this until your EX area is full.

name: Daria, Dimensional Witch (Evolved)
cardText:
On Evolve: Select a follower in your EX area. For the rest of this turn, it costs 5 less to play.
On Evolve: Select a spell in your EX area. For the rest of this turn, it costs 5 less to play.
While this card is on your field, include both spells and [runecraft] followers in your cemetery when counting your Spellchain.

effectText.body: Select a follower in your EX area. For the rest of this turn, it costs 5 less to play.
Select a spell in your EX area. For the rest of this turn, it costs 5 less to play.

cardText:

name: Anne, Belle of Mysteria
cardText:

name: Anne, Belle of Mysteria (Evolved)
cardText: On Evolve: Search your deck for an Academic follower with a different name from this card, reveal it, and add it to your hand.

name: Grea the Dragonborn
cardText:
If there is an Anne, Belle of Mysteria on your field, this card costs 2 less to play.

effectText.body: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage. If there is an Anne, Belle of Mysteria on your field, deal 6 damage instead.
